usecases.title: Transform your customer service
usecases.description_pre: Discover how leading airlines are revolutionizing their customer service with AI,

cases.title: Quotation & Ticket Sales
cases.desc: Guides passengers through a personalized ticket and ancillary purchase process, maximizing revenue and efficiency.
cases.longDesc: The ticket purchase process can be complex and time-consuming, especially with variations for different passenger types and ancillary sales. Our AI agent guides the passenger through an intuitive purchase process directly in their preferred channel (WhatsApp, Instagram, etc.). The AI can quote flights, manage passenger information, proactively offer and sell flights and ancillaries like seat selection or extra baggage, and facilitate secure payment. This increases direct sales, improves ARPU, and reduces operational workload, providing a smooth and convenient buying experience.

cases.title: Simplified Check-in
cases.desc: Automates the check-in process, allowing passengers to get their boarding pass from any channel.
cases.longDesc: Check-in can be a bottleneck, especially during peak times or for passengers less familiar with digital processes. The AI bot automates check-in: it verifies flight status, collects and validates passenger information, allows seat selection, and issues the boarding pass with QR code directly in the chat channel. This reduces the need for physical kiosks, speeds up airport flow, and minimizes human errors.

cases.title: Voluntary Flight Changes
cases.desc: Enables passengers to manage flight changes autonomously, applying fare rules automatically.
cases.longDesc: Flight changes are often a source of frustration and high demand for contact centers. Our AI agent handles flight changes intelligently and automatically: it requests booking data, checks fare rules, presents alternatives, manages payment of any associated fees, and issues the new confirmation. This enables 24/7 self-service, reduces agent workload, and ensures correct rule application.

cases.title: IROPs & Flight Protection
cases.desc: Automates communication and rebooking during delays, cancellations, or diversions, reducing operational chaos.
cases.longDesc: Flight disruptions (delays, cancellations, diversions) create stress and a massive workload for airlines. In IROPs situations, our AI bot proactively notifies affected passengers, identifies and presents alternative flight options, allows selection among different alternatives, and processes rebooking instantly. This reduces chaos, improves the passenger experience, and helps meet regulatory requirements.

cases.title: FAQs & General Queries
cases.desc: Instantly answers frequent questions about policies, services, and procedures, 24/7.
cases.longDesc: A large part of customer interactions are repetitive queries about policies, procedures, and general questions. Our AI bot is an intelligent knowledge base, available 24/7, trained with the airline's rules and policies. It provides immediate and accurate answers, learns from each interaction, and escalates to a human agent if needed, freeing up resources and ensuring consistency.

cases.title: Real-Time Flight Status
cases.desc: Provides up-to-date flight information, gates, delays, and automatic notifications to passengers.
cases.longDesc: Passengers need up-to-date information about their flights, especially on travel days. The AI bot allows passengers to check flight status by number, destination, date, and time, and connects to the airline's systems for real-time information. It can send automatic notifications about changes, reducing uncertainty and improving the experience.

cases.title: Baggage Tracking & Claims
cases.desc: Lets passengers track their baggage and report issues quickly and in a structured way.
cases.longDesc: Lost or delayed baggage is one of the most stressful experiences for a passenger. Our AI agent allows passengers to track baggage by entering the claim or tag number, and to report issues by guiding them through data and documentation collection. This reduces stress, speeds up management, and improves brand image.

cases.title: Abandoned Cart Recovery
cases.desc: Detects and proactively contacts users who abandoned the purchase process, recovering lost sales.
cases.longDesc: A significant percentage of users start the purchase of a ticket or ancillaries online but abandon it before completion. Our AI agent detects abandonment, proactively contacts the user with a personalized message, and facilitates resuming the purchase, recovering sales and optimizing marketing ROI.

cases.title: Automated Refunds
cases.desc: Handles refund requests efficiently, securely, and transparently for passengers.
cases.longDesc: Our AI agents handle refund requests efficiently and securely, connecting with the airline's systems to validate eligibility and process the refund. The passenger receives clear information and status updates on their request, improving transparency and satisfaction.
